page.title: 07TRANSPORT-ST.MARTINS AREA
page.content:
Most people in the area own their own {cars.}Some families have 2 or more {cars.}The area has not got any railways. People who wish to travel by {train}have to travel to Gobowen 5km. away where there are{9 trains} each way to Chester and Shrewsbury.
There are many{bus}stops in St.Martins. On weekdays there is a{bus service to Oswestry (18 each way per day),Sodyllt Bank (7 each way per day) and Ellesmere (8 each way per day).There are extra{buses}to Oswestry on Wednesday for the market.There are no{buses}in the evening or on Sundays.
There is a{taxi}service in St.Martins and a voluntary{car}scheme in St.Martins and Dudleston and surrounding areas.People pay about 4p/km towards the cost.
